parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Identity

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets rank of given unit.

Possible rank values, and the associated [[rating]] that is automatically given:
{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable"
! rowspan<template><title>=</title></template>"2" <template><title>!</title></template> Rank !! colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"3" <template><title>!</title></template> Ratings
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
! ArmA 1 !! <template><title>arma2</title></template> !! <template><title>arma3</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> PRIVATE <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ? <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CORPORAL <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 500 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ? <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> SERGEANT <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 1500 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ? <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> LIEUTENANT <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 2500 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ? <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CAPTAIN <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 3500 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ? <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> MAJOR <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 5000 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ? <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> COLONEL <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 7500 <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ? <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.67 this command is <template><title>Icon</title><part><name index="1"/><value>globalArgument</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>32</value></part></template> <template><title>Icon</title><part><name index="1"/><value>globalEffect</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>32</value></part></template></value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName [[setUnitRank]] rank

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> rank: [[String]] - as above

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setUnitRank]] "COLONEL";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ArmA: Rating Values|Rating Values]], [[rating]], [[addRating]], [[rank]], [[setRank]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on Mar 26, 2009 - 19:24</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Wolfrug|Wolfrug]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Changing a unit's rank using either [[setUnitRank]] or [[setRank]] will also REPLACE their current rating dependent on their new rank (colonels have a rating of 7500 etc). That is to say REPLACE, not add to: the unit's old rating will disappear with the rank change.

<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 24, 2015 - 21:10 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Wyattwic|Wyattwic]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In Arma 3, if the rank is not spelled correctly or the string is empty, it will default to Private.   This command is not case sensitive. For Arma 3 the rating set by this command is as follows.
    (PRIVATE: 0)
    (CORPORAL: 50)
    (SERGEANT: 150)
    (LIEUTENANT: 250)
    (CAPTAIN: 350)
    (MAJOR: 500)
    (COLONEL: 750)   The rating listed here will be present on base type respawn.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 14, 2019 - 21:37 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In <template><title>arma3</title></template> (v1.94), unit's rating is reset to '''zero'''. Also, all ranks start with a rating of '''zero'''.
</dd>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
